name: Ensure imports point to a file/module that can be resolved
description: See description of ESLint rule import/no-unresolved at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Ensure named imports correspond to a named export in the remote file
description: See description of ESLint rule import/named at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Ensure a default export is present, given a default import
description: See description of ESLint rule import/default at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Ensure imported namespaces contain dereferenced properties as they are dereferenced
description: See description of ESLint rule import/namespace at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Restrict which files can be imported in a given folder
description: See description of ESLint rule import/no-restricted-paths at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Forbid import of modules using absolute paths
description: See description of ESLint rule import/no-absolute-path at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Forbid require() calls with expressions
description: See description of ESLint rule import/no-dynamic-require at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Prevent importing the submodules of other modules
description: See description of ESLint rule import/no-internal-modules at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Forbid webpack loader syntax in imports
description: See description of ESLint rule import/no-webpack-loader-syntax at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Forbid a module from importing itself
description: See description of ESLint rule import/no-self-import at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Forbid a module from importing a module with a dependency path back to itself
description: See description of ESLint rule import/no-cycle at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Prevent unnecessary path segments in import and require statements
description: See description of ESLint rule import/no-useless-path-segments at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Forbid importing modules from parent directories
description: See description of ESLint rule import/no-relative-parent-imports at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Report any invalid exports, i.e. re-export of the same name
description: See description of ESLint rule import/export at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Report use of exported name as identifier of default export
description: See description of ESLint rule import/no-named-as-default at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Report use of exported name as property of default export
description: See description of ESLint rule import/no-named-as-default-member at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Report imported names marked with @deprecated documentation tag
description: See description of ESLint rule import/no-deprecated at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Forbid the use of extraneous packages
description: See description of ESLint rule import/no-extraneous-dependencies at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Forbid the use of mutable exports with var or let
description: See description of ESLint rule import/no-mutable-exports at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Report potentially ambiguous parse goal
description: See description of ESLint rule import/unambiguous at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Report CommonJS require calls and module.exports or exports.*
description: See description of ESLint rule import/no-commonjs at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Report AMD require and define calls
description: See description of ESLint rule import/no-amd at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: No Node.js builtin modules
description: See description of ESLint rule import/no-nodejs-modules at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Ensure all imports appear before other statements
description: See description of ESLint rule import/first at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Ensure all exports appear after other statements
description: See description of ESLint rule import/exports-last at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Report repeated import of the same module in multiple places
description: See description of ESLint rule import/no-duplicates at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Report namespace imports
description: See description of ESLint rule import/no-namespace at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Ensure consistent use of file extension within the import path
description: See description of ESLint rule import/extensions at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Enforce a convention in module import order
description: See description of ESLint rule import/order at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Enforce a newline after import statements
description: See description of ESLint rule import/newline-after-import at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Prefer a default export if module exports a single name
description: See description of ESLint rule import/prefer-default-export at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Limit the maximum number of dependencies a module can have
description: See description of ESLint rule import/max-dependencies at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Forbid unassigned imports
description: See description of ESLint rule import/no-unassigned-import at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Forbid named default exports
description: See description of ESLint rule import/no-named-default at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Forbid default exports
description: See description of ESLint rule import/no-default-export at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Forbid anonymous values as default exports
description: See description of ESLint rule import/no-anonymous-default-export at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Prefer named exports to be grouped together in a single export declaration
description: See description of ESLint rule import/group-exports at the eslint-plugin-import website.

name: Enforce a leading commentwith the webpackChunkName for dynamic imports
description: See description of ESLint rule import/dynamic-import-chunkname at the eslint-plugin-import website.
